settings.label: Embed sidebar pages
settings.info: Example: If page title is 'Contact us' and handle is 'contact-us', creating a page called 'Sidebar/Contact us' with handle 'sidebar-contact-us' will display that sidebar page in sidebar of that page.

settings.content: Color specific parts of product page using color tags. Example black heading: #Heading_000000
Orders are processed in your store's currency. [Manage currencies](/admin/settings/payments/shopify-payments)
Add additional cookies to policy page. [View examples](https://shopify.bluehorizonsmarketing.co.uk/articles/shopify-cookie-policy/#examples)

settings.label: Default country selection
settings.info: If customer is logged-in, their country will be selected as default.
